comprehensive_overview: CP2K is an open-source quantum chemistry and solid state physics software package designed to perform atomistic simulations of solid-state, liquid, molecular, and biological systems. It can be used to study a wide range of properties, including electronic structures, molecular dynamics, and vibrational spectra.
core_features: Key features of CP2K include density functional theory (DFT) calculations, molecular dynamics simulations, efficient algorithms for large-scale parallel computations, advanced basis sets, and support for various functionals and dispersion corrections. It also offers tools for studying solvation effects, band structures, and NMR properties.
